name: @luisiseverywhere/ocpp-schema-types
description: A project which uses official ocpp schema data (provided by OCA) and generates the types for request and responses of each occp command

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf ./build && npm install && npm run build:types
scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy:schemas && npm run copy:types && npm run copy:assets
scripts.publish: cd ./build && npm install && npm publish --access public

author: Luis Teixeira
